data.title: Donetsk People's Republic (DPR)
data.meta_description: Since 2014, The Donetsk People's Republic (DPR) in eastern Ukraine have been engaged in direct confrontations with the Ukrainian government in an attempt to gain independence and eventually integrate into the Russian Federation. Initially sparked by the Maidan revolution and Russia's annexation of Crimea, this civil conflict has since escalated into a full-scale war between Russia and Ukraine. Before the Russian military's official involvement in the conflict, anti-government [...]
